isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, BUMPER AND RUNNING BOARDS - MXT - REMOVE AND INSTALL - HOOD

svcsubproc.title: Hood - Removal
svcsubproc.para: Reference Figure 15 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Chock wheels as required.
Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the support spring assemblies.

Disconnect headlight assembly pigtail connectors from the front end wire harness connector (Item 2) located at the top of the frame rail (Item 3) on the driver and passenger side at the radiator mounting blocks (Item 1).
Cut and remove two tie wraps securing headlight wiring harness into "U" channel of hood hinge bar.

figure.caption: Figure 15. Harness Connections (Each Side at Radiator)

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HOOD SUPPORT REINFORCING AND AIR VENT DUCTING

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 16 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove the retaining pin (Item 6) from the spring stop (Item 7). Remove the clevis (Item 4) from the radiator clevis attachment bracket (Item 5) on the radiator top frame (Item 2), driver and passenger side.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Locate the torsion bar hood tilt assist assembly upper brackets (Item 2). Remove the retaining pin (Item 1) that secures the torsion assist bar (Items 3 and 6) to the hood tilt assist bracket (Item 2) driver and passenger side.
Remove the torsion assist bars (Items 3 and 6) from the chassis torsion bar retainer bracket (Item 4).
With an assistant tilt the hood back to the original position.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 18 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Locate the hood hinge pin (Item 4) and hex nut (Item 5) on the hinge assembly (Item 3).
Loosen and remove the hinge bolt/pins (Item 4) and hex nuts (Item 5).
With an assistant, remove the hood assembly (Figure 17). Place the hood on an appropriate padded surface to protect painted surfaces.

svcsubproc.title: Hood - Installation
svcsubproc.para: If required, assemble tilt assist and support spring assemblies, splash panels, insulator panels and the hood hinge plates to the hood before installing it.
Refer to Figure 18 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place a padded work stand in front of the vehicle. With an assistant, rest the hood assembly on the work stand. Place the hood near the chassis so that the hood hinges line up with the hinges on the chassis. Install the two hood hinge pins (Item 4) from the outboard side into each hinge (Item 3).
Install two hex nuts (Item 5) on each of the hinge pins inboard side (Item 4) and tighten.
With an assistant tilt the hood forward and rest on a padded floor stand.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Locate and replace the two torsion assist bars (Items 3 and 6) in the frame torsion bar retainer bracket (Item 4) at each side of the frame rail (Item 7).

Locate the tilt assist hood bracket (Item 2). Insert the end of the torsion assist bar (Items 3 and 6) into the assist hood brackets. Install two retaining pins (Item 1) in the torsion rod ends (Items 3 and 6) of hood.
Raise the hood to approximately a 45 degree angle and support it, to allow for reconnection of the spring cable stops.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 16 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place the clevis (Item 4) over the radiator clevis attachment bracket (Item 5). Insert the retaining pin (Item 6) through the clevis (Item 4) and clevis retaining bracket (Item 5).
Reconnect front end wire harness connector (Item 2, Figure 15) to the appropriate chassis harness connector. Secure the wire harness with the clips and loop clamps provided, as necessary.
Close and latch the hood on both sides.
